PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Due to being able to play this build in a lot of ways this PoB for Melee Skellies is displaying how I would run it. Higher budget I'd go for an Elder helmet for the spectres, I'd even consider adding Tukohama's Vanguard to this as well for the sake of getting super top tier boss kill approach of it.
Regarding Strength stacking vs non strength stacking:
It's really a matter of taste, though resistances could be a potential issue if you're not being careful which however can be solved via jewels and/or not using the optional Necromantic Aegis approach. I generally prefer the get a Taunt on Hit jewel with flat life to me and then of course the #1 dmg providing dmg addition from jewels being the % inc minion dmg when you've used a minion skill recently.
